award_title: PALYIM: A DEEP-LEARNING PLATFORM FOR POLLEN IMAGE ANALYSIS
subject: ML workflows that others can actually run
body:
Publishing ML models is one thing—getting others to actually use them is another. Environment setup, dependency mismatches, the usual headaches.

I built Ouro for the same reason—it's an API layer over workflows so people can reuse methods directly instead of recreating from papers.

Curious if this fits what you're building. Happy to chat after holidays if interested.

Best,

Matt Moderwell
https://ouro.foundation
